org.apereo.cas.authentication.principal

接口 PrincipalAttributesRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface PrincipalAttributesRepository
extends java.io.Serializable
    Defines operations required for retrieving principal attributes. Acts as a proxy between the external attribute source and CAS, executing such as additional processing or caching on the set of retrieved attributes. Implementations may simply decide to do nothing on the set of attributes that the principal carries or they may attempt to refresh them from the source, etc.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
    另请参阅:
    PrincipalFactory

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      Gets attributes for the given principal id.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getAttributes(Principal p)
        Gets attributes for the given principal id.
        参数:
        p - the principal whose attributes need to be retrieved.
        返回:
        the attributes
